name: A Frustrating Platformer
description:
This game offers a frustrating classic platforming experience. Dodge and jump over spikes, saws, arrows and fast spikeheads as you progress through this daunting 2D level. Watch your in-game death counter tally up as the obstacles and even the map itself fight you.

The Future!

More content will be released in the near future for FREE! Featuring all new levels, containing new enemies, mechanics and animations, keep your eye out for further updates!
